column5: looking for a source for 1oz too 2oz Jigs. Does anybody know a place ?.....Thanks

I get big jigs from Cabala's or Bass Pro. Look at the jigs in the saltwater section. Bass Pro has painted round jigs up to two ounces for cheap. Both companies have different style jigs that go over 5 ounces.
Try http://www.mooreslures.com Not sure what he's got, but I'll bet if he has it, it'll be less than most places you look. Dick is a great guy and an even better fisherman. Ask him for a catalogue.
